results.name: max
results.description: Returns the maximum value data point for the time range

results.name: trendmode
results.description: Returns the maximum and minimum value data point for the time range

results.name: count
results.description: Returns the number of data points

results.name: scale
results.description: Scales each data point by a factor

results.name: interpolate
results.description: Does linear interpolation for the chosen window

results.name: diff
results.description: Returns the difference between successive data points

results.name: gaps
results.description: Marks gaps in data according to sampling rate with a null data point

results.name: sampler
results.description: Returns the sampling rate of change for the data points

results.name: div
results.description: Divides each data point by a divisor

results.name: min
results.description: Returns the minimum value data point for the time range

results.name: avg
results.description: Returns the average of the data point set

results.name: least_squares
results.description: Returns a best fit line through the data points using the least squares algorithm

results.name: percentile
results.description: Returns the percentile of the data range

results.name: dev
results.description: Returns the standard deviation of the time series

results.name: rate
results.description: Returns the rate of change for the data points
